title: Steamed plaice in a creamy white wine sauce with broccoli, asparagus and mushrooms
description: Plaice is well suited to steaming as it retains the delicate flavour and texture of the fish. Try it with James Martin's cream sauce for a little luxury. Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need two steamers.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
fish bones, reserved from filleting the plaice
